channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree is dead - has been infected with mistletoe. Likely that branches will start falling off and also an eye sore, 24th April
item.description:
Location is outside the Marks and Spencerâ€™s garage on Prestbury Road .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80-86, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: P.C. Richard Parker advised me today to report as "flytipping" so that the responsible body, the Cotswold District Council, will be able to sort it. Piled-up soil and stones, wooden rails, branches off nearby tree, WARNING barbed wire hidden amongst debris., 24th April
item.description:
Exactly as pinned on map. Between houses 'Windy Ridge' and 'The Lilacs', near Colesbourne, Gloucestershire. Caution to workpeople - be prepared to be challenged by nearby residents. There should only be GCC-erected ROAD CLOSED (not AHEAD) and GCC Highways barriers at this location - Streetworks Permit applies (see Causeway one.network). Public-made obstruction been there for several months, needs clearing so that GCC can ensure that only legally authorised furniture is on site.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colesbourne, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 24th April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please replace x2 missing round post and an new right hand chevron sign. posts approx 800 apart x2 1.8 metre posts an chevron 2000 long sizes are approximate stats required (Damaged Hazard Marker)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 24th April
item.description:
Customer reporting that wing mirror has been dislodged and broken after vehicle struck low, overhanging branch protruding into highway. Customer noticed large amount of broken glass & plastic at same site.
Report on FixMyStreet
